Note: AWS -> Netflix, Airbnb
Core Services vs Extended Services
How services interact with each other?
What problems does cloud computing solve?
Core Services: EC2, S3, RDS, Route53
Extended: EB, Lambda, DynamoDB, VPC, CloudFront, CloudWatch
Problem: Overhead of hardware cost and maintenance
Cloud: Abstracts virtual and physical costs of deployments
2004: AWS launches SQS
AWS: Collection of cloud computing services working together or individually to run software
Each service does some form of computing
AWS Pros: Cost and Scalability
No upfront cost
Extremely scalable b/c lack of dedicated hardware
